name: TheNewStackMakers
0:
”Alexa, open The New Stack Makers”
”Alexa, start The New Stack Makers”
”Alexa, ask The New Stack Makers”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the new stack makers
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The New Stack Makers is all about the developers, software engineers and operations people who build at-scale architectures that change the way we develop and deploy software.

For The New Stack Analysts podcast, please see https://soundcloud.com/thenewstackanalysts

For The New Stack @ Scale podcast, please see https://soundcloud.com/thenewstackatscale

For The New Stack Context podcast, please see https://soundcloud.com/thenewstackcontext

Subcribe to TNS on YouTube at: https://www.youtube.com/c/TheNewStack

Here are a few quick tips when navigating our skill. The First thing to note, when opening the skill you’ll be playing the latest episode, but if that’s not what you’re looking for, you can always find something more specific. This skill allows you to play next or previous episode. In addition, you can ask the skill to play the newest or oldest episodes or if you want to get specific, play a specific episode by saying the episode number. Try some of these commands:

**Next/Previous Episode**
— [While Episode Is Playing] = “Alexa, next”
— [While Episode Is Playing] = “Alexa, previous”

**Select Latest Episode**
— “Alexa, ask The New Stack Makers to play latest episode” 

**Select First Episode**
— “Alexa, ask The New Stack Makers to start from first episode”
